caseTitle: Habibullah Energy Ltd. v. WAPDA thr. its Chairman & others
tagline: The transaction i.e. the lease for 20-years in respect of Lakhra Power Station GENCOIV, dated 11.09.2006, followed by Power Purchase Agreement, dated 15.12.2007, between M/S Associated Group (AG) and the Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) is not sustainable being non-transparent and also suffers from irregularities, illegalities, omissions and commissions as well as violates the relevant rules and precedents set forth by the superior courts.
